description: Unlock creative animation possibilities with GSAP's newly free plugins, explore smooth interactivity with Rive in React, and get inspired by innovative motion designs. Master CSS animations with advanced masking techniques, and enhance multilingual design systems using Figma Variables. Embrace accessibility with insights from the 2025 EMC study, and discover how scroll regions can revolutionize scroll-triggered animations. Keep up with HTML and CSS advancements, including the versatile permission element and the `contrast-color()` function, while learning to optimize HTML document requests for better page speed.
joke: Why did the CSS developer bring a ladder to work? To reach the heights of their container queries!
challenge: Create a dynamic interactive gallery using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that comes to life with scroll-triggered animations. Implement scroll regions to initiate animations as users scroll through the gallery. Use CSS masking techniques to add depth and layering effects. Optionally, incorporate WebGL for enhanced visual effects. The goal is to build a visually engaging and responsive gallery that reacts to user interaction, showcasing your animation and frontend skills.
